job description:
At Fidelity, we love to use data and analytics to personalize
incredible customer experiences and develop solutions that help our customers
live the lives they want. As part of our digital transformation, we have significant
investments to create innovative big data capabilities and platforms. We are
looking for a hands-on data architect that help us design our next generation,
cloud enabled data capabilities.

This position will be
based in Raleigh-Durham, NC.
The Purpose of your role
  • Partner with cross functional teams
    across the company to architect and design and develop our next generation
    customer data platforms using traditional DB technologies, open source
    frameworks and cloud services.
  • Drive a
    holistic information management strategy including capability roadmaps
    across advanced analytic, big data and OLTP (MDM) platforms.
  • Analyze and
    manage technology cost drivers to ensure efficient scale and support of OLTP/OLAP
    capabilities including public cloud migration.
  • Continuously
    drive innovation, evaluate and prototype emerging technologies within
    developer community to understand business value and feasibility of
    proposed solutions.
  • Publish data
    architecture principles, best practices and emerging architecture and design
    patterns to assist development teams in implementing optimal solutions.
  • Govern
    solution architecture and designs to ensure that the implementations are
    aligned with the reference data architecture.
The Skills and Knowledge
You Bring
  • Strong execution skills in a fast-paced
    environment using agile methodologies.
  • Ability to collaborate and
    partner with business domain leads, data scientists, product owners,
    enterprise architects and other functional leads to deliver world class data
    solutions.
  • Knowledge in architecture and
    development of real-time, enterprise scale OLTP and MDM solutions.
  • Mastery of relational database,
    NoSQL, ETL/ELT and data service (APIs) technologies.
  • Strong foundation in Big Data
    Ecosystem technologies with hands on experience implementing scalable data
    ingestion, storage, processing and publication solutions.
  • Hands on experience with public and
    private cloud capabilities including compute, storage, database and APIs.
  • Expertise in designing end to end
    data engineering solutions using a variety of data integration and processing
    patterns.
The Expertise We Are
Looking For
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in
    Engineering, Computer Science or technical field required.
  • Demonstrated technology and leadership
    experience in architecting, designing and building highly scalable OLTP/OLAP
    applications.
  • Enterprise scale expertise in master data
    management (MDM), data analysis & modeling including proven experience
    with data management best practices such as data governance, data
    security, data warehousing, metadata management and data quality.
  • Extensive knowledge and experience
    in architecting modern data ingestion frameworks, integration pattern, highly
    scalable distributed systems using open source and emerging data architecture
    processing designs/patterns.
  • Experience building external
    cloud (e.g. AWS) data applications and capabilities. Expert ability to
    evaluate, prototype and recommend open source and vendor technologies and
    platforms.
  • Extensive hands-on architecture and
    development experience with deep knowledge of data movement, ETL/ELT,
    RDBMS, NoSQL, HDFS, messaging, API (Microservices) and in-memory
    technologies. Hands on experience with Oracle, Informatica, Cassandra,
    Spring Batch, Kafka, NiFi, Flink and Spark technologies is desired.
  • Experience with DevOps,
    Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (Maven, Jenkins, Stash,
    Ansible, Docker).
  • This role requires 3 years of data
    architecture, design and development delivery experience.
Company Overview

At Fidelity, we are focused on making
our financial expertise broadly accessible and effective in helping people live
the lives they want. We are a privately held company that places a high degree
of value in creating and nurturing a work environment that attracts the best
talent and reflects our commitment to our associates. For information about
working at Fidelity, visit FidelityCareers.com

Fidelity Investments is an equal
opportunity employer.
